Protect your

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1722259603156{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm”][vc_single_image image=”311″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1723702682963{padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

[vc_row_inner gap=”30″][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”311″ img_size=”full” css=””][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”141″ img_size=”full” css=””][vc_column_text css=””]

Exterior

[/vc_column_text]

  • Foam Cannon Pre Soak & Rinse
  • Two bucket multi mitt wash (scratch free wash)
  • Engine compartment top surfaces cleaned & dressed to protect
  • Plastic trim restore & tire dressing
  • Deep cleaning of wheels, wheel wells & rims
  • Clean windows & door jams
  • Clay bar treatment for paint & windows (used to remove embedded contaminates that stick to your paint/window)
  • Paint receives an All in one (AIO) polish to reduce minor swirling and defects and provide protection to bring back shine and gloss. 4-6 months of protection.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”142″ img_size=”full” css=””][vc_column_text css=””]

Interior

[/vc_column_text]

  • Wipe interior with UV protection & All Purpose Cleaner (dash, console, leather, vinyl, plastic)
  • Steam cleaning of air vents/cup holders/console area
  • Clean interior windows/mirrors
  • All carpets, mats and any cloth upholstery are vacuumed, scrubbed, shampooed & steam cleaned. If areas are heavy with dirt or soiled, water extraction will be used
  • Leather cleaning treatment (if applicable)
  • Headliner spot cleaned
  • Application of fabric guard to all carpet and cloth seating
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1722349178036{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

Detailing

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

[vc_row_inner gap=”35″][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1722342286140{border-radius: 1px !important;border-color: #ffffff !important;}”]
[vc_single_image image=”315″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1723701098821{margin-top: -5px !important;margin-right: -20px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;}”]
Starts at:
$850
  • Paintwork, glass emblems, and plastics/rubbers are properly cleaned, and decontaminated with clay bar treatment.
  • Tires, wheel, and wheel wells deep cleaned, and tires dressed.
  • The Exterior glass is cleaned, and the windshield is protected with Rain X.
  • Each panel on your vehicle is compounded and polished with a 2 step process to safely remove swirls, defects, and minor scratches for up to 80-90%.
  • This 1 step process safely removes swirls, defects, and minor scratches.
  • Paint is protected with a 12 month sealant.
    ( Process may take 2-3 days depending on condition of vehicle and heavy water spots are an extra charge due to more work added)
  • Black plastics will be cleaned and dressed with a restoring protectant.
    (Please note that not all swirls and scratches will be removed, depending on the year and condition of the vehicle. Furthermore, neglected paint may not benefit from this service. An in-person quote is recommended.)
book now
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1722342317059{border-color: #ffffff !important;}”]
[vc_single_image image=”316″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1723701105613{margin-top: -5px !important;margin-right: -20px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;}”]
Starts at:
$250
  • Paintwork, glass, emblems, plastics/rubbers cleaned and decontaminated with clay bar treatment.
  • Tires, wheels and wheel wells cleaned and dressed.
  • Exterior glass is cleaned and decontaminated.
  • Paintwork receives an All in one polish with a dual action polisher(buffer) to deep clean paint, increase shine and gloss, and reduce minor swirls.
  • Protection may last up to 3-5 months.
  • Black plastics are cleaned and dressed with restoring protectant
book now
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1722342223483{border-color: #ffffff !important;}”]
[vc_single_image image=”317″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1723701111889{margin-top: -5px !important;margin-right: -20px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;}”]
Starts at:
$175
  • Paintwork, glass, emblems, and plastics/rubbers are properly cleaned, and decontaminated with clay bar treatment.
  • Tires, wheels, and wheel wells are cleaned and dressed to shine.
  • Door jambs and gas lid is cleaned.
  • Exterior glass is cleaned
  • Paintwork is protected with high-quality carnauba wax lasting up to 3 months.
  • Black plastics are cleaned and dressed with restoring protectant.
